value.body: Jackie Chan's Project A (1983; English version)
value.text: Jackie Chan's Project A (1983; English version)

paragraphs.body: Tatasciore has commonly portrayed secondary characters as well as monstrous-looking types. He is best known for voicing the Hulk in the Ultimate Avengers, Next Avengers, Hulk Vs, and The Avengers: Earth's Mightiest Heroes, as well as for voicing Saren from the critically acclaimed game Mass Effect and Damon Baird in the Gears of War video game series. He also voiced Screaming Mantis, Crying Wolf, Raging Raven, and Laughing Octopus in the video game Metal Gear Solid 4: Guns of the Patriots. He also voiced the character "8" in the Tim Burton-produced film 9, which was released September 9, 2009.
paragraphs.text: Tatasciore has commonly portrayed secondary characters as well as monstrous-looking types. He is best known for voicing the Hulk in the Ultimate Avengers, Next Avengers, Hulk Vs, and The Avengers: Earth's Mightiest Heroes, as well as for voicing Saren from the critically acclaimed game Mass Effect and Damon Baird in the Gears of War video game series. He also voiced Screaming Mantis, Crying Wolf, Raging Raven, and Laughing Octopus in the video game Metal Gear Solid 4: Guns of the Patriots. He also voiced the character "8" in the Tim Burton-produced film 9, which was released September 9, 2009.

paragraphs.body: In 2011, Tatasciore was given his first 'on screen' acting credit as Faceless Steven in Hellraiser: Revelations. He also provided the dubbed-over voice of Pinhead (while actor Stephan Smith Colins portrayed the character) in the same film; however, Tatasciore was only credited as "Voice of Pinhead".
paragraphs.text: In 2011, Tatasciore was given his first 'on screen' acting credit as Faceless Steven in Hellraiser: Revelations. He also provided the dubbed-over voice of Pinhead (while actor Stephan Smith Colins portrayed the character) in the same film; however, Tatasciore was only credited as "Voice of Pinhead".
